content: materials - yarn a 1 3 skein s of purl soho s line weight 2 100% merino wool each skein is 494 yards/ 100 grams approximately 494 1240 yards required - yarn b 1 2 skein s of purl soho s linen quill 3 50% fine highland wool 35% alpaca and 15% linen each skein is 439 yards/ 100 grams approximately 305 665 yards required - us 3 3 25 mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 4 we used blue jeans + cobalt blue for our scarf and true turquoise + pink pop for our wrap note the original version of this project was knit in 2 colors of linen quill and featured only a scarf size for more on that version visit the original blog post here 6 gauge 30 stitches and 56 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions approximately 8 18 inches wide x 70 inches long originally designed by purl soho designer kristina mcgowan 7 click here 8 to see even more of kristina s designs 2 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 3 https //www purlsoho com/linen-quill html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 6 http //www purlsoho com/create/2016/04/15/speckled-scarf/ 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/kristina-mcgowan-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www frogandcast com/
